main event: A couple observed a large, white, round object hovering in the sky while traveling on the San Diego Freeway.
interesting points: The object was about 20-25 feet in diameter and appeared to be translucent or semi-transparent.,The object hovered for approximately 20 seconds before moving rapidly in a southwesterly direction.,The couple reported a sense of awe and bewilderment at the sight.,Witnesses were unable to rationalize the object as a known type of aircraft.,A prior sighting described a disc-shaped object hovering silently with a brilliant white light.
witness description: a couple traveling on the freeway
